scripts.dev: concurrently --names "Next,TS,Go" "cd docker-ardua-444 && yarn dev" "cd docker-go-95 && go run main.go" "cd docker-socket-96 && yarn dev"
scripts.dev1: concurrently --names "Next,TS,Go" "cd docker-go-95 && go run main.go" "cd docker-socket-96 && yarn dev"
scripts.prod: concurrently --names "Next,TS,Go" "cd docker-ardua && yarn dev" "cd docker-go && go run main.go" "cd docker-socket && yarn dev"
